blog.name: jurakan
blog.title: Eye of the Storm
blog.description:
It's Hoo-rah-KAN, named after the Taino word for storm. 'Cause I'm Puerto Rican.
This is mostly a fandom blog, but it does often verge into religion, and on occasion into politics.

title: The Daily Digest - Tuesday 7th May 2019
body:
The Daily Digest – Tuesday 7th May 2019

The Peoples Movies always trying to bring you the best of the news from film, Television, Streaming. That’s not always possible due to many factors, We love to try out new ideas and The  Daily Digest is our latest idea.

The Daily Digestwe hope to bring you the latest news, stories, links, trailers that are wither too small to create full story or we just want you you enjoy. This will be hopefully…

summary: Sam: Did you tap that? Steve: A gentleman never tells. Peggy: [beaming in from her timeline] YOU’RE GODDAMN RIGHT I TAPPED THAT....
body:
Sam: Did you tap that?

Steve: A gentleman never tells.

Peggy: [beaming in from her timeline] YOU’RE GODDAMN RIGHT I TAPPED THAT. I TAPPED THAT SO HARD HE CRIED.

[Sam and Peggy exchange the biggest high five in the multiverse]

summary: Avengers spoilers also I'm on mobile can't hide it sorry
title: Avengers spoilers also I'm on mobile can't hide it sorry
body: I’m not mad that Sam got the shield, I think he’s a better choice than Bucky. I’m mad that Steve and Bucky barely glanced at each other during the whole past two Avengers movies. They spoke a small handful of short sentences. They acted like…vague, neutral-but-friendly acquaintances.

reblog.comment: I’m not mad that Sam got the shield, I think he’s a better choice than Bucky. I’m mad that Steve and Bucky barely glanced at each other during the whole past two Avengers movies. They spoke a small handful of short sentences. They acted like…vague, neutral-but-friendly acquaintances.

trail.content_raw: I’m not mad that Sam got the shield, I think he’s a better choice than Bucky. I’m mad that Steve and Bucky barely glanced at each other during the whole past two Avengers movies. They spoke a small handful of short sentences. They acted like…vague, neutral-but-friendly acquaintances.

They spoke a small handful of short sentences. They acted like…vague, neutral-but-friendly acquaintances.

summary: Now that sufficient time has passed, I can rage about the worst offense about Avengers: endgame without it being spoilers: Fuck...
body:
Now that sufficient time has passed, I can rage about the worst offense about Avengers: endgame without it being spoilers:

Fuck the Steve ending, it’s a hole bigger than the plot

The movie spends three hours blatanty slamming at you that altering the past does not alter the present because the altered past becomes a new timeline. They go as far as mocking all timetravel movies that did differently

But if so, Steve could not appear in front of them. The new past he created by going back and living with Peggy would be a new timeline different from their own, and thus they would not meet old Steven according to their own movie logic. The Russo brothers can’t spend three hours hitting the audience with the fact that the timetravel means new timelines only for that to not count when its convenient for their shit writing. 

Steve could have done a Tony and simply left a letter and the shield to be found after he left for the past, thus passing on the Captain America mantel without this bullshit. He could have brought Peggy to the future, since the movie climax was literally all about how bringing people from the past to live in the present is perfectly fine (and they do it with Gamorra)

summary: Avengers: Endgame es la película más taquillera en la historia de México
title: Avengers: Endgame es la película más taquillera en la historia de México
body:
Avengers: Endgame es la película más taquillera en la historia de México

Avengers: Endgame continúa rompiendo récords en el país. Además de lograr el mejor día de apertura y la mejor semana de estreno en México, en tan solo 10 días, la película logró obtener la taquilla más grande de la historia, recaudando más de $1,170,588,658 pesos mexicanos.

Con más de 18.8 millones de espectadores en México a la fecha, el público puede seguir disfrutando de la película en todos…

summary: Joe Russo Wants to Make a Batman Movie
title: Joe Russo Wants to Make a Batman Movie
body:
One of the co-directors of Avengers: Endgame wants to direct a Batman Movie. Joe Russo, famed for his involvement in the MCU. The acclaimed director has revealed the film he’d choose to make, if he ever worked with DC.

Of course its Batman. Cue the cheesy joke… I wish I could just snap my fingers and make it happen.

Joe, along with brother Anthony, was originally known for his TV work. That…

summary: hello again friends this time i am back with a public service announcement™️
body:
hello again friends this time i am back with a public service announcement™️

i will NO LONGER use the tag endgame spoilers after this friday (5/10). consider yourselves warned.

my other tags will of course stay active. and as usual, all endgame critical posts are tagged with anti endgame

~ mod syd

blog.name: artemisegeria
blog.title: This Is Not The Endgame
blog.description: Unapologetic Vision and Wanda Maximoff Stan

tags: i know we know next to nothing but it is fun to speculate
any of these could definitely be wrong
title: WandaVision Guess Game
body:
Great idea @happywanda

I want to play. These are things that I think seem likely to happen, not necessarily things that I want to happen.

- Some variation of the twins will be introduced (this could go from Wanda being pregnant by the end to fully fledged individuals being present) – Every thing about recent rumors/press/casting in Endgame indicates that they are building up to some version of the Young Avengers. For example, just earlier today or yesterday, RDJ tweeted out a Riri Williams comic cover. This goes well with the rumored Hawkeye project and the five year time jump in Endgame.

- This ties into the earlier theory, but Vision will be restored off-screen before the show even starts - If they’re going to spend a portion of the show building up the kids, as I suspect, there’s less time to devote to actually fixing Vision. 

- We will get to see more of the post-Endgame world (e.g. new governments, effect on regular people, societal upheaval, etc.)

- WandaVision is not the actual title – I won’t believe this is actually the title until I see an official logo or something. I’m not even sure Falcon and the Winter Soldier is the real title of their show, seeing as the reveal that Sam is now Captain America would have been a huge spoiler. This title does make sense with one branch of theories that I’ve seen (that all the events of the show are happening in either Wanda’s or Vision’s mind), but I am not convinced yet.

-Both Wanda and Vision are still going to be alive, together, and happy at the end of the show – We can dream, right?

- Vision will appear in his usual synthezoid form (not as some variation of human!Vision or White Vision)

- There will be flashbacks to earlier parts of their relationship

blog.name: throughyellowlights
blog.title: Let's blow this popsicle stand!
blog.description: Momma didn’t raise a quitter, but she did raise a fool; and it turns out those two things are a terrible combination.
